text: Her du hevalen mine zindane! (rind gohdarya min bikin. Arsa van xewnen ku we diti eva ye): "Yeke ji we, we disa meye bide xweye xwe, ewe mayi we be dardakirine, we (terme wiye li derva bimine) cuke di sere wi da ewi bixun. Ewa buyera ku we arsa wi ji min xwestiye; pek hatiye (idi qe ne qayilbuna xwe, diyar nekin)
